scripts.build: yarn run react-scripts build && rm -rf deploy && mkdir deploy && cp -a server/. deploy/ && mv build deploy/static && rm deploy/grades.csv
scripts.deploy: cd deploy && gcloud builds submit --tag gcr.io/banded-syntax-252420/16a-grades && gcloud beta run deploy statuscheck --image gcr.io/banded-syntax-252420/16a-grades --platform managed
